subject: Kentucky Derby
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
lead_paragraph: Super Saver’s two-and-a-half-length victory Saturday in the Kentucky Derby was seen on NBC by an average of 16.5 million viewers, up from 16.3 million for Mine That Bird’s win last year.
snippet: Super Saver’s two-and-a-half-length victory Saturday in the Kentucky Derby was seen on NBC by an average of 16.5 million viewers, up from 16.3 million for Mine That Bird’s win last year.
